JobFullDesc: Global Compliance creates the foundation upon which the company’s business and corporate teams comply with relevant laws and regulations. We are present in every geographical region where Uber’s businesses operate, aligned closely to the business teams, and our team at HQ works with the corporate functions to embed compliance and ethics into HQ programs. It is our mission and passion to support Uber to do the right thing. Period.About the Team Uber is looking for a sharp, highly motivated individual to join the Global Data Compliance team as a Senior Program Manager. This team is responsible for working with Tech and Operations to build scalable solutions for some of the most challenging problems in the Compliance space.What You’ll DoEvaluate global processes against market requirements and internal standards to identify needed remediations and tech development opportunitiesDefine product needs and strategy by identifying common issues impacting global operations teamsCollaborate with Tech, Operations, Legal, Policy, and Safety teams to ensure that insights inform broader strategic initiativesDesign data-driven programs and processes to increase reliability and efficiency in meeting Uber’s operational obligationsEstablish global standards for how Uber evidences compliance to regulators and other authoritiesBasic QualificationsMinimum 6 years of relevant work experienceBachelor's degree or equivalent experienceStrong SQL proficiencyPreferred QualificationsExperience with PythonOperational experience working in a regulatory spaceExperience in change managementExcellent Excel / data management skillsExceptional communication and organization skillsAbility to deal with ambiguitySelf-starter with the ability to choose a direction with little oversightWorks independently and possesses strong organization and time management skillsExperience creating, maintaining, and executing robust project plans
